example.parse: (IP (PP-PRP (ADVP (AD 不)) (ADVP (AD 就)) (PP (P 因为) (IP (NP-SBJ (NN 景气)) (VP (VV 看坏))))) (PU ，) (NP-TPC (CP (WHNP-1 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (VP (VP (VV 开) (NP-OBJ (NN 花) (NN 店))) (PU 、) (VP (ADVP (AD 专)) (VP (VV 卖) (NP-OBJ (NN 切花)))))) (DEC 的))) (NP-APP (NN 老板)) (NP-PN (NR 王年丰))) (ADVP (AD 近来)) (NP-SBJ (NN 唉声)) (VP (VV 连连)))
